overview:
Julian has a track record in defining the web 2.0 experience for a portfolio of startup companies. Prior to Omnisio, Julian was the Visual Communications Manager at Vquence; an online media startup. Julian developed the Vquence brand and visual identitiy from the ground up, and implemented the video authoring interface to enable the search and sequencing of video horizontally across many video hosting sites.

Julian was responsible for developing the branding and managing the media assets at Sensory Networks, and has deep expertise in UI best practices having worked as an advisor developing online strategies for 2threads and design direction for 3eep.

Julian earned a Bachelor of Science in Business Information Technology at the University of New South Wales in Sydney, Australia where he was awarded the highly selective Co-op Scholarship, and completed his degree at the University of California, San Diego.

In his spare time, Julian enjoys electronic music production and is learning about video production.
